Author: russ
Content: I think you're playing down how much better the search results were between Google and Altavista & Co. I agree the next Google could come out of left field, but my comment is directed toward the author's headline, implying that his company is "the next Google."  I may have misinterpreted what he meant, but that's what I was speaking of.

Author: nickb
Content: Yeah, but hardware and your time to get all the stuff working is not (well, in my case it is not). If you have lots of free time, Linux is indeed free.
